title: Chris, Blue Collar to Academia to Tech, Christianity and Transformation
description:
Chris comes in for a randos chat and shares his story. You can find him at the Bridges of Meaning Discord server and he has his own Youtube Channel too with music. https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCCebR16tXbv5Ykk9_WtCCug

Notes: 
Born in 1984, father is a mason, mother in the medical field

Moved around a lot, hard to make friends. Skinny, shy introverted, bullied

Developed quite an anger problem. 

Luis Palau crusade, altar call, inability to NOT go forward, tremendous weight lifted

Most of childhood had a fear of going to sleep at night, night terrors

Inception night terrors, Used to have esoteric thoughts, what if I wake up and discover I've just been dreaming

After his salvation experience he loved going to sleep at night

The anger problem significantly dissipated

Had no plans of going to college, Terrible in school. Picked up playing guitar at 14 maybe. Dad in a southern rock tribute band

Girl's parents were the youth group leaders

Upstate NY

Criminology: Why people commit crime

JBP Biblical Series

Sarah

Youth Advocate Program YAP

Devereaux: youth with developmental disabilities

Youth detention facility: pay better, corruption better

You want to become that kind of person who can speak at a tragic funeral



 the strong person at the funeral

Almost always experienced my life in the third person

My mom prayed for me my whole life

Superficial differences are causing intense, real, physical damage

The deeper I go, the less satisfying it is. The further I go, the colder and colder it gets

The world doesn't need you setting them right. The world needs to get reconciled with Jesus

Needs to accept the reconciliation offered to them. 

Click here to meetup with other channel viewers for conversation https://discord.gg/jdVk8XU

Vanderklips channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCX0jIcadtoxELSwehCh5QTg

If you want to schedule a one-on-one conversation check here. https://paulvanderklay.me/2019/08/06/converzations-with-pvk/

For the audio podcast mirror on Podbean http://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/

To listen to this on ITunes https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/paul-vanderklays-podcast/id1394314333 

If you need the RSS feed for your podcast player https://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/feed/ 

All Amazon links here are part of the Amazon Affiliate Program. Amazon pays a small commission at no additional cost to you if you buy through one of the product links here. 

To support this channel/podcast on Paypal: https://paypal.me/paulvanderklay

To support this channel/podcast with Bitcoin (BTC): 37TSN79RXewX8Js7CDMDRzvgMrFftutbPo 
To support this channel/podcast with Bitcoin Cash (BCH) qr3amdmj3n2u83eqefsdft9vatnj9na0dqlzhnx80h 
To support this channel/podcast with Ethereum (ETH): 0xd3F649C3403a4789466c246F32430036DADf6c62

Powerpoints of Monologue videos are available for Patrons at https://www.patreon.com/paulvanderklay

Also on Lbry: https://lbry.tv/@paulvanderklay

Paul's Church Content at Living Stones Channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCh7bdktIALZ9Nq41oVCvW-A

To support Paul's work by supporting his church give here. https://tithe.ly/give?c=2160640
